example: ye'me, bho gotama, puggalā assaddhā jīvik'atthā na saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitā saṭhā māyāvino ketabino uddhatā unnaḷā capalā
upāsakaṃ maṃ bhagavā dhāretu ajja't'agge pāṇ'upetaṃ saraṇaṃ gataṃ
na hetaṃ, bhikkhave, atthasaṃhitaṃ n'ādibrahmacariyakaṃ na nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya na upasamāya na abhiññāya na sambodhāya na nibbānāya saṃvattati
